trans-unit.source: Provides a base implementation for channels that want to expose a dictionary interface to their properties.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação base para canais que desejam expor uma interface de dicionário a suas propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> class handles the complexity of asking the sinks in a channel sink chain for their properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> classe manipula a complexidade de solicitar os coletores de uma cadeia de coletor de canal para suas propriedades.

trans-unit.source: After the channel constructs its sink chain (if applicable), it must set the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties.SinksWithProperties> property.
trans-unit.target: Depois que o canal constrói sua cadeia de coletor (se aplicável), ele deve definir o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties.SinksWithProperties> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe faz uma demanda de link e uma demanda de herança no nível de classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> é gerada quando o chamador imediato ou classe derivada não tem permissão de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre as exigências de segurança, consulte [demandas de Link](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) e [demandas de herança](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission Value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties" />, you must implement the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Keys" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Item(System.Object)" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar de <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties" />, você deve implementar o <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Keys" /> propriedade e o <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Item(System.Object)" /> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties" />.

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the channel properties associated with the current channel object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> das propriedades de canal associadas ao objeto de canal atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the channel properties associated with the current channel object.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> das propriedades do canal associadas ao objeto atual do canal.

trans-unit.source: Channel properties are used to configure the channel at run time.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de canal são usadas para configurar o canal de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: O chamador imediato não tem permissão de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Indicates the top channel sink in the channel sink stack.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o coletor de canal superior na pilha de coletores de canal.

trans-unit.source: Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages that are flowing through the channel as well as the stream that is used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object.
trans-unit.target: Coletores de canal fornecem um ponto de plug-in que permite o acesso às mensagens subjacentes que fluem do canal, bem como o fluxo que é usado pelo mecanismo de transporte para enviar mensagens para um objeto remoto.

trans-unit.source: Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the messages are serialized and transported.
trans-unit.target: Coletores de canal vinculadas em uma cadeia de provedores de coletor de canal, e todas as mensagens de canal fluem por meio dessa cadeia de Coletores antes que as mensagens são serializadas e transportadas.
